mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM TEST_STNDR_TB WHERE TEST_STNDR_TB.STATE != 'D'
AND ifnull(FN_MEM_NAME(TEST_STNDR_TB.INS_MEM_ID), '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND date_format(TEST_STNDR_TB.ins_dt, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND TEST_STNDR_TB.TEST_STNDR like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')

set @rownum:=0;
SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as no, lst.* FROM ( SELECT TEST_STNDR_SEQ, TEST_STNDR_TB.TEST_STNDR, IFNULL(TEST_STNDR_TB.MEMO, '') MEMO, date_format (TEST_STNDR_TB.ins_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') insDtStr, IFNULL(FN_MEM_NAME (TEST_STNDR_TB.ins_mem_id), '') memName FROM TEST_STNDR_TB WHERE TEST_STNDR_TB.STATE != 'D'
AND ifnull(FN_MEM_NAME(TEST_STNDR_TB.INS_MEM_ID), '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND date_format(TEST_STNDR_TB.ins_dt, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND TEST_STNDR_TB.TEST_STNDR like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
order by TEST_STNDR_TB.TEST_STNDR_SEQ ASC ) lst ORDER BY no desc
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(TEST_STNDR_SEQ) testStndrSeq FROM TEST_STNDR_TB;
INSERT INTO TEST_STNDR_TB ( TEST_STNDR_SEQ, TEST_STNDR, MEMO, INS_MEM_ID, UDT_MEM_ID ) VALUES ( IF(#{testStndrSeq}=0,(SELECT IFNULL(MAX(seq.TEST_STNDR_SEQ)+1,1) testStndrSeq FROM TEST_STNDR_TB seq), #{testStndrSeq}), #{testStndr}, #{memo}, #{insMemId}, #{udtMemId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TEST_STNDR = #{testStndr}, MEMO = #{memo}, UDT_MEM_ID = #{udtMemId}, UDT_DT = NOW(), STATE = #{state}

SELECT MAX(TEST_CATE_SEQ) testCateSeq FROM TEST_CATE_TB;
INSERT INTO TEST_CATE_TB ( TEST_CATE_SEQ, DEPTH, NAME, TOP_DEPTH_SEQ, MEMO, INS_MEM_ID, UDT_MEM_ID ) VALUES ( IF(#{testCateSeq}=0,(SELECT IFNULL(MAX(seq.TEST_CATE_SEQ)+1,1) testCateSeq FROM TEST_CATE_TB seq), #{testCateSeq}), #{depth}, #{name}, #{topDepthSeq}, #{memo}, #{insMemId}, #{udtMemId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE UDT_MEM_ID = #{udtMemId}, UDT_DT = NOW(), STATE = #{state}
